```{r setup}
library(mhcnuggetsr)
```

```
if (is_mhcnuggets_installed()) {
  epitope_predict(
    class_='I',
    peptides_path='data/test/test_peptides.peps', 
    mhc='HLA-A02:01'
  )
}
```


```

    mhc='HLA-A02:01', 
    ba_models=True
  )
}
```
